Good Things Festival App

Brief: Experience the thrill of Australia's beloved music festival, Good Things Festival, right from your phone! Although we weren't given an in-depth description, it's clear that this app is designed to enhance your festival-going experience with details of the lineup, schedules, venue maps, and much more.
